a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Urban and rural population projected to 2050, World, 10,000 BCE to
Total urban and rural population, given as estimates to 2023, and UN projections to 2050. Projections are based on the
UN World Urbanization Prospects and its median fertility scenario.
Data source: United Nations, Department of Economic and Social Affairs, Population Division (2018); HYDE (2023)
